channel.title: In My Arms Remix Contest
channel.description:
Hey Everyone, My song In My Arms has almost got 100 plays and because of that i wanted to make a remix contest. Listen to the song [Here](https://soundcloud.com/aviodjmusic/in-my-arms) on my soundcloud. The winner of the contest will get a repost of the remix and a link in my instagram and soundcloud bios for as long as you exist. I will also make a playlist of all the Remixes.I really want this to happen because it is so close to 100 and it will be a big milestone for me. Here are some rules:
**1.** Your remix **won't** be chosen for the contest if it doesn't have the selected cover art.
**2.** Remixes must be public and posted on SoundCloud. If you keep them private they will not be chosen.
**3.** Remixes must be submitted by the **17th of May** AEST. If they are submitted after the due date they will still be put on the playlist but wont win any prizes.
**Winners prize** A repost, your SoundCloud be put in my bio for as long as you make music and i will like all of your songs and remix or collab one song.
Project link: https://app.auxy.co/projects/4cWOLkcPtOrlk36UVZGNcA== Thanks and i hope we can get as many people as possible to attempt it. Please use the cover art below.
![image_6483441%20(4)|553x500](upload://uCcmU1eYQPgTGbozkz22BjIXjbe.JPG)

item.title: In My Arms Remix Contest
item.dc:creator: AnirudhKhanna
item.description:
Lol you already asked me to remix this yesterday. I’ll remix it don’t worry

item.title: In My Arms Remix Contest
item.dc:creator: Aviomusic
item.description:
Hey Everyone,
My song In My Arms has almost got 100 plays and because of that i wanted to make a remix contest.
Listen to the song Here on my soundcloud.
The winner of the contest will get a repost of the remix and a link in my instagram and soundcloud bios for as long as you exist. I will also make a playlist of all the Remixes.I really want this to happen because it is so close to 100 and it will be a big milestone for me.
Here are some rules:

1. Your remix won’t be chosen for the contest if it doesn’t have the selected cover art.

2. Remixes must be public and posted on SoundCloud. If you keep them private they will not be chosen.

3. Remixes must be submitted by the 17th of May AEST. If they are submitted after the due date they will still be put on the playlist but wont win any prizes.

Winners prize
A repost, your SoundCloud be put in my bio for as long as you make music and i will like all of your songs and remix or collab one song.

Project link: https://app.auxy.co/projects/4cWOLkcPtOrlk36UVZGNcA==
Thanks and i hope we can get as many people as possible to attempt it.
